fixes.name: number of records
fixes.dax_expression: AVERAGE('TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Número de cédula:])
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau AVG([Número de cédula:]) to DAX AVERAGE('TABLA FINAL_ Encuesta_Transpues (Varias conexiones)'[Número de cédula:]). The column reference was transformed to the 'Table'[Column] syntax and the aggregation function was mapped from AVG to AVERAGE.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses an aggregation (AVG), therefore it should be created as a measure.
